segments.text: I just dropped in to say good-bye .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm going to try to leave by ten .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Take care and give my best to your parents .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good-bye . Hope to see you soon again next year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't forget to call us if you're in Tokyo .
segments.speaker: S2
